Sentencas: Transition metal-doped lanthanum chromites (La0.8Ca0.2)(Cr0.9-xCo0.1Fex)O-3 (x = 0.03, 0.06, 0.09, 0.12) have been synthesized by solid state reaction method.
Titulo: Preparation and Charge Density in (Co, Fe)-Doped La-Ca-Based Chromite

Sentencas: The synthesized samples were characterized for their structural properties using powder x-ray diffraction analysis, which shows that the grown samples are orthorhombic in structure with single phase.
Titulo: Preparation and Charge Density in (Co, Fe)-Doped La-Ca-Based Chromite

Sentencas: The nature of bonding and the charge distribution of the grown samples have been analyzed by maximum entropy method.
Titulo: Preparation and Charge Density in (Co, Fe)-Doped La-Ca-Based Chromite

Sentencas: Further, the samples were characterized for their optical and magnetic properties using ultraviolet-visible spectra and vibrating sample magnetometry.
Titulo: Preparation and Charge Density in (Co, Fe)-Doped La-Ca-Based Chromite

Sentencas: The microstructural studies were carried by scanning electron microscopy/electron dispersive x-ray spectroscopy techniques.
Titulo: Preparation and Charge Density in (Co, Fe)-Doped La-Ca-Based Chromite

Sentencas: From the optical absorption spectra, it was found that the energy band gap of the samples ranges from 2.135 eV to 2.405 eV.
Titulo: Preparation and Charge Density in (Co, Fe)-Doped La-Ca-Based Chromite

Sentencas: From vibrating sample magnetometer measurements, ferromagnetic like behaviour with large coercive field was observed for Fe doping concentration of x = 0.12.
Titulo: Preparation and Charge Density in (Co, Fe)-Doped La-Ca-Based Chromite

Sentencas: Since the doped lanthanum chromites have good mechanical properties and electrical conductivity at high temperature, these materials are used in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Preparation and Charge Density in (Co, Fe)-Doped La-Ca-Based Chromite
